title: Elevate Your Summer Wardrobe With These Editor-Approved Linen Pant Outfits
description: This trend is set to dominate the season.
excerpt: They’re set to dominate the season.
text: There’s nothing quite like the versatility of a breezy linen pant. Whether you’re throwing together a comfortable office-appropriate ensemble, packing for your next tropical getaway, or looking for a timeless staple to wear every weekend, this airy style is an absolute must-have. As the warmer, more humid months draw near, I’ve started to anticipate all the chic ways I plan to style a linen pant. I prefer tailored trousers to achieve an elegant, polished look at work, while I reserve my cozy drawstring options for casual weekend outings and vacations. Having lived the past decade in the sweltering city of Dallas, I’ve developed a profound appreciation for linen due to its unparalleled breathability—it’s one of the only fabrics that can truly keep me cool when I start to break a sweat. Beyond comfort, it’s a natural, sustainable textile known for its durability, and it’s also timeless; it routinely makes a comeback each spring. Additionally, it’s low maintenance, typically machine washable, and effortlessly provides that relaxed, lived-in look that I can’t get enough of this season. Linen is the perfect summer textile to embrace the oversized, slouchy trend, and some of our favorite brands have been unveiling incredibly chic relaxed-fit and wide-leg styles that flatter all body types. This gauzy pant is available in a spectrum of colors—from crisp whites and khaki greens to soft neutrals and blacks—ensuring you can find a shade to complement any summer look. Read on to discover 10 editor-approved ways to style this summer’s must-have essential.An Oversized Blazer and a Bracelet BagJeremy Moeller/Getty ImagesAchieve a refined, effortlessly chic aesthetic for cooler evenings by styling a wide-leg pant with a structured, oversized blazer. Pair it with crisp white trousers for a clean, refined ensemble and a coordinating bag for a look that feels both effortless and intentional.Lacoste Wool V-Neck Tennis SweaterJ.Crew New Soleil PantTKEES Mia Napa SandalPrada Arqué Small Leather Shoulder BagMiu Miu Regard SunglassesEliou Devon EarringsNow 20% OffA Tailored Power Suit and Butter Yellow SandalValentina Valdinoci/Launchmetrics SpotlightConsider this your spring uniform—a power suit in a trending pastel shade paired with an effortless, wearable heel. Accessorize with softer, playful accents like a butter yellow sandal and a suede bag. html:
There’s nothing quite like the versatility of a breezy linen pant. Whether you’re throwing together a comfortable office-appropriate ensemble, packing for your next tropical getaway, or looking for a timeless staple to wear every weekend, this airy style is an absolute must-have.

As the warmer, more humid months draw near, I’ve started to anticipate all the chic ways I plan to style a linen pant. I prefer tailored trousers to achieve an elegant, polished look at work, while I reserve my cozy drawstring options for casual weekend outings and vacations.

Having lived the past decade in the sweltering city of Dallas, I’ve developed a profound appreciation for linen due to its unparalleled breathability—it’s one of the only fabrics that can truly keep me cool when I start to break a sweat. Beyond comfort, it’s a natural, sustainable textile known for its durability, and it’s also timeless; it routinely makes a comeback each spring. Additionally, it’s low maintenance, typically machine washable, and effortlessly provides that relaxed, lived-in look that I can’t get enough of this season.

Linen is the perfect summer textile to embrace the oversized, slouchy trend, and some of our favorite brands have been unveiling incredibly chic relaxed-fit and wide-leg styles that flatter all body types. This gauzy pant is available in a spectrum of colors—from crisp whites and khaki greens to soft neutrals and blacks—ensuring you can find a shade to complement any summer look.

Read on to discover 10 editor-approved ways to style this summer’s must-have essential.

An Oversized Blazer and a Bracelet Bag

Achieve a refined, effortlessly chic aesthetic for cooler evenings by styling a wide-leg pant with a structured, oversized blazer. Elevate the ensemble with playful accessories, such as a Chloé bracelet bag for a touch of elegance and a woven flat to maximize comfort.

H&M Linen-Blend Blazer

Favorite Daughter The Jones Linen Wide Leg Pant

Madewell The Remy Mary Jane Flat

Now 18% Off

Chloe Chloe Bracelet Handbag

Gentle Monster Savage 01 Oval-Frame Sunglasses

Amber Sceats Lila Earrings

Stand-Out Sunglasses and a Knit Sweater

Opt for a preppy V-neck sweater styled off-shoulder for a weekend brunch look that doubles as a polished courtside outfit. Pair it with crisp white trousers for a clean, refined ensemble and a coordinating bag for a look that feels both effortless and intentional.

Lacoste Wool V-Neck Tennis Sweater

J.Crew New Soleil Pant

TKEES Mia Napa Sandal

Prada Arqué Small Leather Shoulder Bag

Miu Miu Regard Sunglasses

Eliou Devon Earrings

Now 20% Off

A Tailored Power Suit and Butter Yellow Sandal

Consider this your spring uniform—a power suit in a trending pastel shade paired with an effortless, wearable heel. Accessorize with softer, playful accents like a butter yellow sandal and a suede bag. This look is just as versatile as it is sophisticated—whether you’re stepping into a meeting or a late dinner, this ensemble will make a confident statement at every turn.

Mango Linen-Blend Suit Blazer

Mango Straight-Fit Linen-Blend Suit Pants

Dolce Vita Brevel Wide Heels

Madewell The Dakota Saddle Bag

Le Specs Le Specs Magnifique

Jennifer Fisher Hinge Knot Huggie Earrings

A Baby-Tee and a Shoulder Bag

Embody the off-duty model style with this cool, laid-back look. Consider wearing a relaxed drawstring pant with a simple white tee, and add a sizeable leather shoulder bag for any spontaneous errand hauls.

Good American Baby T-Shirt

Rails Emmie Pants in White

Adidas Originals Samba OG in Ivory

Aspinal of London Hudson Crescent Bag in Black

Ray-Ban Oval Sunglasses in Arista

Shashi Dasha Necklace in Metallic Gold

A Short-Sleeve Cardigan and a Logo Belt

Choose a white pant with pleats for a crisp, sophisticated look. Cinch the waist with a suede belt to add definition, and introduce rich contrast with a dark red Bottega Veneta bag. Complete this outfit with a white mesh shoe for a modern edge and sleek aviator sunglasses.

A.L.C Parker Fine Cotton Cardigan

H&M Wide-Leg Linen-Blend Pants

Aureum No. 10 Suede Belt

Tony Bianco Mia Mary Jane Flat

Bottega Veneta Bang Bang Vanity Case

Linda Farrow Joey Rectangular Frame Sunglasses

Now 28% Off

A Polo Shirt and White Sneakers

Ideal for sun-drenched strolls, this outfit strikes the perfect balance between structure and softness. This pastel, fitted polo has an ultra-flattering silhouette and looks effortless when paired with a gauzy linen palazzo pant. Complete the ensemble with a simple white sneaker, oversized sunglasses, and a neutral mini bag.

Veronica Beard Kearney Short-Sleeve Polo Tee in Pink Clay

Zara 100% Linen Palazzo Pants

Axel Arigato Clean 90 Sneakers

Freja Mini Chrystie Bag

DIFF Berkely 59mm Polarized Navigator Sunglasses

Gorjana Venice Mini Bracelet Layering Set

A Structured Top and Coordinating Bag

Wear linen in creamy, neutral shades for a refined, modern feel. This top features a unique appliqué and adds the perfect amount of detail. A loose-fit pant ensures comfort, while a Prada raffia bag and sling-back kitten heel keeps things polished.

Majorelle Maelis Top

Faithfull the Brand Meave Trouser

Prada Re-Edition Crochet Mini-Bag

Mango Pointed Kitten-Heel Shoes

Miu Miu Logo Acetate Oval Sunglasses

Heaven Mayhem Heaven Mayhem Baby Knot Earrings

Cat-Eye Sunglasses and a Black Heel

This sleek, modern look combines a black linen tube top and a striped linen pant layered under an oversized masculine blazer. For some retro flair, add a statement pair of sunglasses and a sharp black heel.

The Frankie Shop Bea Twill Blazer

Babaton Element Linen Tube Top

Madewell The Superwide-Leg Trouser

Now 16% Off

Antonia Saint NY The Vida Classic High Heel

Quay Tempted Frame

Shashi Cosmo Huggies

Now 17% Off

A Linen Blazer and Cut-Out Top

This look is all about understated drama. Huge sunglasses and an eye-catching cut-out top give this crisp suit ensemble some femininity and edge. Keep things cool with a casual flip-flop heel and a dainty necklace.

Favorite Daughter The Suits You Linen Blazer

Now 25% Off

Edikted Liana Cutout Camisole

Favorite Daughter The Low Favorite Linen Pant

Anthropologie Thong Kitten Heels

Gorjana Wilshire Adjustable Necklace

Max Mara Eyewear Square Frame Sunglasses

A Vest Top and Statement Clutch

This khaki co-ord puts a utilitarian spin on the linen suit trend. Add some edge to this cool, breathable look with Chloé sandals, which feature bold belted detailing. Complete the outfit with a stand-out Bottega Veneta clutch.

J.Crew Cutaway Vest Top

J.Crew Wide-leg Essential Pant

Chloé Mae Leather Buckle Flat Slide Sandals

Banbe Alba Sunglasses

Shashi Talia Bracelet Cuff

Bottega Veneta Andiamo Clutch

Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
